curam.util.cache

Interface CacheListener<K>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - the key
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CacheListenerAdapter

    public interface CacheListener<K>
    Listener for cache events.
    The callbacks to these methods are possibly unsynchronized. It is the responsibility of the implementer to handle any potential concurrency issues.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClear()
      Invoked when the cache is cleared.
      void onEvict(K key)
      Invoked when an object is evicted from the cache.
      void onPut(K key)
      Invoked when an object is put into the cache.
      void onRemove(K key)
      Invoked when an object is removed from the cache.
      void onUpdate(K key)
      Invoked when an object mapped to key key is updated.

    • Method Detail

      • onClear

        void onClear()
        Invoked when the cache is cleared.

      • onEvict

        void onEvict(K key)
        Invoked when an object is evicted from the cache.
        Parameters:
        key - the object's key

      • onPut

        void onPut(K key)
        Invoked when an object is put into the cache.
        Parameters:
        key - the object's key

      • onUpdate

        void onUpdate(K key)
        Invoked when an object mapped to key key is updated.
        Parameters:
        key - the object's key

      • onRemove

        void onRemove(K key)
        Invoked when an object is removed from the cache. This method is not invoked when the cache is cleared. See CacheListener.onClear().
        Parameters:
        key - the object's key
